quote: Monsters are real, and ghosts are real too. They live inside us, and sometimes, they win. – Stephen King
fact: A person cannot taste food unless it is mixed with saliva. For example, if a strong-tasting substance like salt is placed on a dry tongue, the taste buds will not be able to taste it. As soon as a drop of saliva is added and the salt is dissolved, however, a definite taste sensation results. This is true for all foods.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke:
I used to work at a stationery store.  But, I didn't feel like I was going anywhere.

So, I got a job at a travel agency.  Now, I know I'll be going places.
